permanent_driving_license.title: Permanent Driving License
permanent_driving_license.description: Iyi serivisi ifasha abayikoresha kwiyandikisha gukora ikizamini cy''uruhushya rwa burundu rwo gutwara ikinyabiziga.Akamaro k''iki kizamini ni ugusuzuma ubushobozi bw''umuntu bwo gutwara ikinyabiziga. Iki kizamini gikorwa n''umuntu wujuje nibura imyaka 18.
